subject: Snowboarding
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Nate Holland took advantage of a crash involving the two leading riders and won the snowboard World Cup race in Veysonnaz, Switzerland, by half a board-length over Markus Schairer of Austria.
snippet: Nate Holland took advantage of a crash involving the two leading riders and won the snowboard World Cup race in Veysonnaz, Switzerland, by half a board-length over Markus Schairer of Austria.
